languages.text: {n}Я прерываю их жестом. Методы их охоты — не мои. Я извлекаю крупицу истины из их слов и вплетаю в свой план.{/n} "Мы должны спровоцировать их на шаг".
{n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."
languages.original_text: {n}Я прерываю их жестом. Методы их охоты — не мои. Я извлекаю крупицу истины из их слов и вплетаю в свой план.{/n} "Мы должны спровоцировать их на шаг".

traits.locale_text: {n}I interrupt them with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. I take a grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan.{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

{n}I cut them off them with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

languages.text: {n}Ich unterbreche sie mit einer scharfen Geste. Ihre Jagdmethoden sind nicht die meinen. Doch ich nehme den Funken der Wahrheit aus ihren Worten und webe sie in meinen Plan:{/n} "Wir müssen sie provozieren, etwas zu tun."
languages.original_text: {n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich unterbreche sie mit einer scharfen Geste. Ihre Jagdmethoden sind nicht die meinen. Doch ich nehme den Funken der Wahrheit aus ihren Worten und webe sie in meinen Plan:{/n} "Wir müssen sie provozieren, etwas zu tun."

languages.text: {n}Les interrumpo con un gesto. Sus métodos de caza no son los míos, pero tomo el grano de verdad de sus palabras y lo entretejo en mi plan:{/n} «Necesitamos provocarles para que actúen».
languages.original_text: {n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les interrumpo con un gesto. Sus métodos de caza no son los míos, pero tomo el grano de verdad de sus palabras y lo entretejo en mi plan:{/n} «Necesitamos provocarles para que actúen».

languages.text: {n}私は身振りで彼らを切り落とす。その狩猟方法は私のものではない。しかし、私は彼らの言葉から一粒の真実を受け取り、計画へと織り込んでいく。{/n}「彼らを挑発して、行動を起こさせなくては」
languages.original_text: {n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

traits.locale_text: {n}私は身振りで彼らを切り落とす。その狩猟方法は私のものではない。しかし、私は彼らの言葉から一粒の真実を受け取り、計画へと織り込んでいく。{/n}「彼らを挑発して、行動を起こさせなくては」

languages.text: {n}我做了个手势，打断了他们的话语。他们的狩猎方法与我不同，但我从他们的谈论中找到了一丝真理，将其编织到我的计划之中。{/n}“我们需要惹怒那些人，让他们采取行动。”
languages.original_text: {n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

traits.locale_text: {n}我做了个手势，打断了他们的话语。他们的狩猎方法与我不同，但我从他们的谈论中找到了一丝真理，将其编织到我的计划之中。{/n}“我们需要惹怒那些人，让他们采取行动。”

languages.text: {n}Je les interromps d'un geste. Nos méthodes de chasse sont bien trop différentes. Mais de leurs paroles, je retiens la vérité et la tisse dans mon propre plan :{/n} « Nous devons les inciter à agir. »
languages.original_text: {n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."

traits.locale_text: {n}Je les interromps d'un geste. Nos méthodes de chasse sont bien trop différentes. Mais de leurs paroles, je retiens la vérité et la tisse dans mon propre plan :{/n} « Nous devons les inciter à agir. »

languages.text: {n}Onları bir el hareketiyle durduruyorum. Av yöntemleri benimkiyle örtüşmüyor. Yine de sözlerindeki o bir tutam hakikati alıp planıma dokuyacağım.{/n} "Eyleme geçmeleri için onları kışkırtmalıyız."
languages.original_text: {n}I cut them off with a gesture. Their methods of hunting are not mine. But I take the grain of truth from their words and weave it into my plan:{/n} "We need to provoke them into making a move."
